desc: This robust 90-minute chipping seminar created by 5-time PGA Tour winner, Danny Edwards, will help you predict and execute chipping around the greens like a tour-player. Be precise, stop guessing around the greens. Learn the system that produces gimmes!

layout.text: "Let me take 2, 3, 4 strokes off your scores with The Chipping Equation Today!"
-Danny Edwards, 5-Time PGA Tour Winner, Winner of the Japanese Masters & Top 100 Professional Golfer of the Modern Era
